titleStmt.title: The French way of exercizing the infantry as it is now practis'd in the armies of his most Christian Majesty. Translated from the French, October the 31. 1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Dorman Newman at the Kings Arms in the Poultry, and Jonathan Edwin at the Three Roses in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
